text: phosdo tang cheachraen mk pi mcheasa robsa puok anak pitchea ban mk dl puok anak . bokkol na del bankheunh( anouvotd tam phosdo tang teang nih) ku( meanobrayoch) samreab khluon ke phtal . rie bokkol na del min meul( min anouvotd tam) sechakdeivineasa ku samreab khluon ke phtal . haey khnhom( mou ham meat) minmen chea anakattuol khosatrauv leu puok anak laey
